body_html: There is no plan to update contrib.layers.optimize_loss. If you require mixed precision updates, it is best to write the loss update yourself (you can use the implementation of optimize_loss or training.create_train_op as an example).
body_text: There is no plan to update contrib.layers.optimize_loss. If you require mixed precision updates, it is best to write the loss update yourself (you can use the implementation of optimize_loss or training.create_train_op as an example).
body: There is no plan to update contrib.layers.optimize_loss. If you require mixed precision updates, it is best to write the loss update yourself (you can use the implementation of optimize_loss or training.create_train_op as an example).
